external_games.name: Dawn of H'btakh: Get Lost and Die
Dawn of H'btakh: Get Lost and Die

name: Dawn of H'btakh: Get Lost and Die
summary:
This is an arcade rogue-like FPS. H'btakh has a lot of super powers that he can use to collect keys and escape each procedurally generated labyrinth.

He must constantly run away from the ruthless Lilac, who wants to kill him for feeding her bad meat.
